reuters.title: GENRAD <GEN> OFFERS SOFTWARE FOR TESTING
reuters.body: GenRad Inc said it introduced a software product that allows for development of test programs for its 227X line of in-circuit/functional test systems on Digital Equipment Corp's <DEC> VAX-based computers. GenRad said the product, named ATG-32, provides for off-line development of test systems at four- to eight-times the speed of its current 227X test program. It said ATG-32 is priced at 30,000 dlrs and is available immediately. Reuter 
